metadata.title: CVE-2021-40402 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the RS-274X aperture macromultiple outline primitives functionality of Gerbv 2.7.0 and dev (commitb5f1eacd), and Gerbv forked 2.7.1 and 2.8.0. A specially-crafted Gerberfile can lead to information disclosure. An attacker can provide amalicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gerbv package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-07-07').
